actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide loans for the prevention of retarding of streambank erosion which threatens public and private facilities.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to provide interest-free loans to public or private groups or individuals for preventing streambank erosion.

titles.title: A bill to provide loans for the prevention of retarding of streambank erosion which threatens public and private facilities.
